rows.label: tlk000023_msg0001
rows.name:
I must say, I never expected to be
traveling on the same vessel as the
Holy Grail and her Driver.

rows.label: tlk000023_msg0002
rows.name:
Worry not, I have no hostile intentions
towards you at present.

rows.label: tlk000023_msg0003
rows.name:
I have resolved to observe your journey
and judge its worth for myself.
